    GenericSchur._trexchange! — Function.

    reorder T by a unitary similarity transformation so that T[iold,iold] is moved to T[inew,inew]. Also right-multiply Z by the same transformation.

    GenericSchur._usolve!
    GenericSchur._usolve0!
    GenericSchur.abs1
    GenericSchur.adjtrsylvester! — Function.
    adjtrsylvesterh!(A,B,C) => X, σ

    solve the Sylvester equation $Aᴴ X - X Bᴴ = σ C$, for upper triangular A and B, overwriting C and setting σ to avoid overflow.

    GenericSchur.convert
    GenericSchur.doubleShiftQR!
    GenericSchur.eigvalscond — Function.
    eigvalscond(S::Schur,nsub::Integer)

    Estimate the reciprocal of the condition number of the nsub leading eigenvalues of S. (Use ordschur to move a subspace of interest to the front of S.)

    See the LAPACK User's Guide for details of interpretation.

    GenericSchur.eval
    GenericSchur.gschur — Function.

    gschur(A::StridedMatrix) -> F::Schur

    Computes the Schur factorization of matrix A using a generic implementation. See LinearAlgebra.schur for usage.

    GenericSchur.gschur! — Function.

    gschur!(A::StridedMatrix) -> F::Schur

    Destructive version of gschur (q.v.).

    GenericSchur.include
    GenericSchur.norm1est! — Function.
    norm1est!(applyA!,applyAH!,y::Vector) => γ

    Estimate the 1-norm of a linear operator A expressed as functions which apply A and adjoint(A) to a vector such as y.

    cf. N.J. Higham, SIAM J. Sci. Stat. Comp. 11, 804 (1990)

    GenericSchur.rankUpdate!
    GenericSchur.safemin — Function.

    a "safe" version of floatmin, such that 1/sfmin does not overflow.

    GenericSchur.safescale! — Function.

    multiply an array A by a real number cto/cfrom expressed as a ratio, computing without over/underflow where possible.

    cfrom must not be zero.

    GenericSchur.singleShiftQR!
    GenericSchur.subspacesep — Function.
    subspacesep(S::Schur,nsub::Integer)

    Estimate the reciprocal condition of the separation angle for the invariant subspace corresponding to the leading block of size nsub of a Schur decomposition. (Use ordschur to move a subspace of interest to the front of S.)

    See the LAPACK User's Guide for details of interpretation.

    GenericSchur.triangularize — Function.
    triangularize(S::Schur{T}) => Schur{complex{T})

    convert a (standard-form) quasi-triangular real Schur factorization into a triangular complex Schur factorization.

    GenericSchur.trsylvester! — Function.
    trsylvester!(A,B,C) => X, σ

    solve the Sylvester equation $A X - X B = σ C$ for upper triangular and square A and B, overwriting C and setting σ to avoid overflow.
